sentences.en: One potential hazard is the temptation to report unverified claims by scientists that would be rejected by a peer-reviewed journal.
sentences.cn: 一个潜在危险是你会被诱惑报道科学家未经证实的主张，而这些主张可能会被同行评议的杂志拒绝。
科学不会认可未经证实的假设.

sentences.en: The general goal was to close all "unverified defects" before a specific date.
sentences.cn: 主要的目标是在一个具体日期前消除所有“未经核对的缺陷”。

sentences.en: These unverified statements are repeatedly as evidence over a lengthy period of 20 years.
sentences.cn: 而这种缺乏验证的口供居然被在长达20年的调查周期中多次使用.

sentences.en: Unverified information of uncertain origin usually spread by word of mouth; hearsay.
sentences.cn: 谣言,谣传;传闻:来源不明且未经证实的信息,通常由口头语言传播; 传说.

words.tran_cn: 未经核对的，未经证实的

trans.tran_cn: 未经证实的，未经核实的
trans.tran_en: not having been confirmed, substantiated, or proven to be true
